definitely trying to make their way out, but the only door was blocked by fire," James Daly said. the apartment entrance opens to a hallway and the kitchen, which was engulfed within a few minutes. if the fire gets into that hallway, there is no way to get out without going through it, said anna marie baronowski, the tenant association president. she said she and other tenants often unplug their smoke alarms.
